title: Improvement of Areal Precipitation for Rainfall-Runoff Modeling using Modified Topographic Information
description: Developed a novel directional DEM smoothing and stratified kriging framework, reducing precipitation estimation errors by 45.4%. Quantified impact on a calibrated HBV model for flood forecasting.

title: Flood Risk Reduction - Ro√ühaupten
description: Micro-level flood risk assessment for the Rosshaupten Municipality. Utilized high-resolution geospatial parameters to model hydrological response and design culvert/retention mitigation strategies.

title: Glacier Dynamics Analysis - Nepal
description: Investigated long-term glacier dynamics (1990-2020) in the Marshyangdi river basin. Applied Machine Learning to multi-temporal Landsat and Sentinel-2 imagery for ice differentiation.

title: Snowmelt Runoff Modeling
description: Integrated satellite-derived radiation data into a physically-based snowmelt runoff model for the Inn River Basin, Bavaria. Enhanced model accuracy for efficient water management.

title: Post-Disaster LULC Detection
description: Quantified Land Use/Land Cover change patterns in Panauti and Banepa Valley following the 2015 Nepal earthquake using Change Detection techniques and ground validation.
